price: 84. Haast je dus niet tegen hen; Wij tellen al hun daden nauwkeurig.
arabic: فَلَا تَعۡجَلۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡۖ إِنَّمَا نَعُدُّ لَهُمۡ عَدّٗا

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: falā taʿjal ʿalayhim innamā naʿuddu lahum ʿaddan
